metadata.title: CVE-2019-20478 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In ruamel.yaml through 0.16.7, the load method allows remote code executionif the application calls this method with an untrusted argument. In otherwords, this issue affects developers who are unaware of the need to usemethods such as safe_load in these use cases.

criterions.comment: ruamel.yaml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
